extendedInfo.description: Human Writes connects you to our publication, wherever you are in the world.Stay informed with the latest human rights headlines and original stories from around the globe. The app delivers the publication in a unique and easy-to-read format. Itâs fast, fun and informative. Lead the conversation by sharing pictures, comments, and dig deeper into the stories about the issues revolving around our freedoms.-  Go beyond the headlines with international movements, local events, and knowledgeable opinions on human rights.-  Share our articles, photos and videos through Facebook, Twitter and e-mail.-  Get breaking news notifications to be the first to read about our events, opinions, and featured articles as soon as they appear. -  Contribute your own story or opinion to Human Writes by uploading photos and comments directly from your app. Follow our editors and other readers like you.Whether you are a generous sponsor or advertiser, an interested subscriber, or better yet - a devoted follower, we all have a stake in the success of this endeavor. Let us never forget that the price of freedom remains eternal vigilance, and that in our special case, it also posits the presence of an ally, an advocate, an ambassador â We Do Humans Right.Have questions or feedback on the Human Writes App? Feel free to E-mail us at admin@human-writes.org. We are always looking for suggestions on how to provide the best experience possible for you.
